ðŸ“– Summary: Colanode is an open-source, local-first collaboration workspace designed as an alternative to Slack and Notion. It prioritizes data privacy and control by allowing users to self-host their data while providing real-time chat, rich text pages, customizable databases, and file management capabilities.
